name: Head & Neck
description: Cranial structures, facial anatomy, and cervical regions including brain, cranial nerves, and neck viscera

name: Back & Spinal Cord
description: Vertebral column, spinal cord, meninges, and supporting musculature

name: Thorax
description: Thoracic wall, mediastinum, lungs, and heart including all thoracic viscera

name: Abdomen
description: Abdominal wall, peritoneum, gastrointestinal organs, liver, kidneys, and associated structures

name: Pelvis & Perineum
description: Pelvic girdle, pelvic organs, urogenital structures, and perineal anatomy

name: Upper Limb
description: Shoulder, arm, forearm, and hand including all bones, muscles, nerves, and vessels

name: Lower Limb
description: Hip, thigh, leg, and foot including all bones, muscles, nerves, and vessels
